# Resources Docs

## Resources

- [Get started resources](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/ai/resources/get-started.md): This article provides a list of resources for .NET developers who are starting to build AI apps with .NET.
- [Azure AI resources](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/ai/resources/azure-ai.md): This article provides a list of resources about Azure AI scenarios for .NET developers, including documentation and code samples.
- [MCP server resources](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/ai/resources/mcp-servers.md): This article provides a list of resources for .NET developers who are building MCP servers.
